name: accordion
title: Accordion
description: Extend the default collapse behavior to create an accordion. It requires both target and target-group attributes for this to work.

options.name: id
options.description: An id attribute needs to be set on <vs-collapse> tag and referenced in <vs-collapsetoggle> using target attribute.

options.name: group
options.description: A group attribute needs to be set on <vs-collapse> tag and referenced in <vs-collapsetoggle> using target-group attribute.
